SUMMARY: A library for bits of crypto UI and parsing etc
DESCRIPTION: GCR is a library for displaying certificates, and crypto UI, accessing key stores. It also provides the viewer for crypto files on the GNOME desktop.
DEPENDS: gtk+3 p11-kit glib-2.0 libgcrypt gnupg-native            libxslt-native
inherit: gnomebase gtk-icon-cache gtk-doc features_check upstream-version-is-even vala gobject-introspection gettext mime mime-xdg
